mapper.select: select ship.*,student.studentName,student.sex, student.college,student.major,student.className from stu_class_grant ship,stu_basic_info student where ship.studentNo=student.studentNo and classGrantState=1 and ship.studentNo=#{studentNo} and ship.term=#{term};

select classGrant.studentNo from stu_class_grant classGrant,stu_basic_info student where classGrant.studentNo=student.studentNo and student.college=#{college} and student.className=#{className} and classGrant.term=#{term} order by classGrant.studentNo desc
select className from stu_basic_info where studentNo = #{studentNo};
